void addIdToSymtab ( DNode  node,
AddIdStructPtr  data 
)

Add an identifier to the symbol table and store its offset This function is called by dlinkApply1.

Parameters:
node a node on a linked list containing the symbol table index of a variable delcared in a program
data a structure containing the symbol table index of the type of the variable, the symbol table, and the current offset in the activation record.

Returns:

void emitDataPrologue ( DList  dataList  ) 

Print the assembly prologue that includes the data section, a declaration of main and an allocation of stack space for the main routine.

Parameters:
dataList a list of data declarations (strings and floats)
frameSize The number of bytes need for local variables declared in main

SymTable  symtab,
int  regIndex 
)

Insert instructions to test whether the expression of a if-statement is false, if false, branch around the then-part of the if-statement.

Parameters:
instList a list of instructions
symtab a symbol table
regIndex the symbol table index of the register holding the rest of the test expression of an if-statement
Returns:

SymTable  symtab,
int  beginLabelIndex,
int  endLabelIndex 
)

Insert a branch back to the the landing pad of a while loop, followed by a branch target for loop exit.

Parameters:
instList a list of instructions
symtab a symbol table
beginLabelIndex a symbol table index of the label for the while loop landing pad
endLabelIndex a symbol table index of the lable for the exit of the while loop
int emitWhileLoopLandingPad ( DList  instList,
SymTable  symtab 
)

Parameters:
instList a list of instructions
symtab a symbol table
Returns:
the label for the backwards branch target
int emitWhileLoopTest ( DList  instList,
SymTable  symtab,
int  regIndex 
)

Insert a test to enter a while loop. If the test is false, branch to a label after the loop.

Parameters:
instList a list of instructions
symtab a symbol table
regIndex a symbol table index for the register holding the result of the test expression of a while-statement
Returns:
a symbol table index for the label at the end of the while-loop
void emitWriteExpression ( DList  instList,
SymTable  symtab,
int  regIndex,
char *  syscallService 
)

Add the instructions needed to write a value using the print system call.

Parameters:
instList a Dlist of instructions
symtab a symbol table
regIndex the symbol table index of the register to be printed (must be addres if string)
syscallService the system call print service to use (format string for x86)
